heading: HB05161
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 493 TO INCLUDE IN THE COVERAGE OF PROHIBITION THE USE, WEARING, MANUFACTURE AND SALE OF UNIFORMS AND TEXTILE OF UNIFORMS OF THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, PRESCRIBING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2019-11-05

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05161
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 493 TO INCLUDE IN THE COVERAGE OF PROHIBITION THE USE, WEARING, MANUFACTURE AND SALE OF UNIFORMS AND TEXTILE OF UNIFORMS OF THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, PRESCRIBING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
